import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import'./EmployeesDash.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const EmployeesDashboard=_ref=>{let{onFormSwitch}=_ref;const[payments,setPayments]=useState([]);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchPayments=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch('https://localhost:3001/api/payments');if(!response.ok){throw new Error('Failed to fetch payments');}const data=await response.json();setPayments(Array.isArray(data)?data:[]);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching payments:',error);setError('Error fetching payments');setPayments([]);}};fetchPayments();},[]);const handleVerify=async paymentId=>{try{const response=await fetch(`https://localhost:3001/api/payments/${paymentId}/verify`,{method:'PUT',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});if(response.ok){// Update the local payments state to reflect the verification status
setPayments(payments.map(payment=>payment._id===paymentId?{...payment,verified:true}:payment));}else{console.error('Failed to verify payment');}}catch(error){console.error('Error verifying payment:',error);}};const handleLogout=()=>{onFormSwitch('login');alert('You have been logged out.');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"employees-dashboard",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"navbar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"navbar-right",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"nav-link logout",onClick:handleLogout,children:"Log Out"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Employees Dashboard"}),error?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:error}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"employees-table",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Object ID"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Amount"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Currency"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"SWIFT Code"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Date"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Actions"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:payments.map(payment=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:payment._id}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:payment.amount}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:payment.currency}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:payment.swiftCode}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:new Date(payment.date).toLocaleString()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleVerify(payment._id),disabled:payment.verified,style:{backgroundColor:payment.verified?'grey':'blue',color:'white'},children:payment.verified?'Verified':'Verify'})})]},payment._id))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"submit-button",children:"Submit"})]});};
